comments.en: One cartridge for black, another for CMY

For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

To get its maximum quality, use the "hpijs" driver.

Same printer as 842C.

Older comments:

Works out of the box with various PCL3 drivers.
Under Linux this printer does up to 600x600dpi in colour with CRET. To obtain this use the Gimp-Print driver (4.1.99) in 600x600 dpi, or the cdj880 or cdj970 drivers with RET turned on and presentation quality.

The german magazine c't - Magazin fuer Computertechnik (21/2000) recommends for the HP DeskJet 840C:
Text: cdj670/300x300
Photo: cdj880/2400x2400
STP not tested.
